document.full_text: a pakistani court on wednesday indicted a cia contractor on two counts of murder at a hearing held at a prison in lahore, a police official said, in a move that may further strain relations between pakistan and the united states.
document.title: pakistan court indicts cia contractor for double murder
lines_and_colors: a pakistani court on wednesday indicted a cia contractor on two counts of murder at a hearing held at a prison in lahore, a police official said, in a move that may further strain relations between pakistan and the united states.
